Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.endGameElements

Class endGameVisuals

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.endGameElements.endGameVisuals
public class endGameVisuals extends Object
This class' main functionality is to display the visual elements within the end game screen, those being mainly the score, the relevant texts and a button for the user to quit the game. Most methods in this class only adds elements within the groups they're given. The class is not interactive by nature and it's functionalities are purely for aesthetics

  • Method Details

    • getQuitButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button getQuitButton()
      Method that gets the button within the end game scene, used in the EndGame class to add functionalities to it (i.e. the ability to quit the game by pressing on the button.)
      Returns:
      the quit button with no functionalities implemented into it.

    • setLoseEndTitle

      public void setLoseEndTitle(javafx.scene.Group root)

    • setWinEndTitle

      public void setWinEndTitle(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method takes in the group for the scene in order to insert the Win text ("You've Won!!!") into the scene. Only triggered when the user has a 2048 tile in their screen.
      Parameters:
      root - the elements within the End Game scene

    • setEndScore

      public void setEndScore(javafx.scene.Group root, long score)
      Method takes in the group for the scene and the score that the user has set in order to insert the score number. The method does not have the functionality to detect a new highscore, again this is purely visual.
      Parameters:
      root - the elements within the End Game scene
      score - the score the user ahs set before triggering the game lost condition.

    • setEndButton

      public void setEndButton(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method used to add the quit button into the end game scene without any functionalities.
      Parameters:
      root - the elements within the End Game scene

    • setNewHighScore

      public void setNewHighScore(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method used to add the text for when there is a new highscore set for a particular game mode. Whenever the class is instantiated, the mode is updated when the user has made their choice.
      Parameters:
      root - the elements within the End Game scene

    • makeBgRekt

      public void makeBgRekt(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method that inserts the background rectangle for text visibility, due the fact that the background of the end game scene and the text in the scene is also white.
      Parameters:
      root - the elements within the End Game scene
